name: Dung D. Le
content: Andrew-DungLe Le Duy Dung (Andrew) Program Director of the B.Sc. in Data Science, Associate Program Director of the B.Sc. in Computer Science Le Duy Dung is an Assistant Professor at College of Engineering and Computer Science, VinUniversity, where he leads the R2Studio reseach group on AI-empowered Search and Recommendation and IndoorCare research group on AI and Simulation for Smart Indoor Spaces. Previously, he was a senior data scientist in Ads and Personalization team, Grab Holdings Inc. and a research scientist in School of Information Systems, Singapore Management University (SMU). He earned his PhD in Data Science and Engineering from SMU, under the supervision of Associate Professor Hady W. Lauw. More details can be found in his CV (updated Jan 2024) Funded Projects V-IndoorCARE: An advanced AI-enabled environmental simulation and HVAC control system for greener and healthier multi-user indoor facilities in Vietnam(PI, Duration: 2025-2027, VinGroup Innovation Fund, Website). Robust Vietnamese-English Clinical and Educational Medical Translation ( PI, Duration: 2024-2026, VinUni Cross-College Fund). SMART-CEM: Applying Artificial Intelligence (AI) and eye-tracking in designing and managing delightful customer experiences in the hospitality sector (co-PI, Duration: 2023-2025, VinGroup Innovation Fund - VINIF). Smart Indoor Air Quality Control System for Healthier and Greener Buildings (PI, Duration: 2022-2026, VinUni-Illinois Smart Health). Language Processing Adaptations for Multiple Recommendation Tasks (PI, Duration: 2023-2025, VinUni Seed Grant). Multimodal Federated Learning for Multi-objectives Recommendation (PI, Duration: 2022-2024, VinUni Fast Track Grant).
